title: How do I login to Unidays (I am a freshie)
content: I want to login to Unidays and verify my university as PES but not sure what credentials to use, do I need to have a .edu mailID for this?

comments.body: Contacted support and they made me upload photos of id card and yeah it worked

Alternate method would be to login thru idp.pes.edu
For which u have to ask the credentials.
Login to unidays using portal, it will open [idp.pes.edu](http://idp.pes.edu) tab. Around 12 days ago, PES Library team must have sent you idp credentials in your pesuacademy related personal mail.
Where is the option to login through portal, I cant find it
After clicking "Join Unidays Now", give your personal email for otp, then the verification page should ask for portal/email. Email doesn't work as it doesn't recognize onmicrosoft domain.
